    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • findBestMove

        public static Move findBestMove(java.lang.String[][] board)
        Parameters:
        board - This is a 2D grid representing the present state of the board
        Returns:
        This method returns the best move that the computer has to take against human by calling min-max algorithm.
        This function returns cell position as move object that minimizes the human score

      • isMovesLeft

        public static boolean isMovesLeft(java.lang.String[][] board)
        Parameters:
        board - This is a 2D grid representing the present state of the board
        Returns:
        This method returns true when all the cells are occupied by either "O" or "X"
        This function returns true when all the cells are not filled else returns false

      • evaluate

        public static long evaluate(java.lang.String[][] board)
        Parameters:
        board - This is a 2d grid representing the present state of the board
        Returns:
        This method returns the score corresponding to the present state by evaluating all rows, columns, diagonal and secondary diagonal
        This function computes score corresponding to the state of the given tictactoe grid

      • minimax

        public static long minimax(java.lang.String[][] board,
                           int depth,
                           boolean isMax)
        Parameters:
        board - This is a 2d grid representing the present state of the board
        depth - This is the depth of recursion happening while computing the solutions
        isMax - This represents weather this method is invoked for max or min state
        Returns:
        This method returns the score corresponding to the permuted state
        This function computes score corresponding to the state of the given tictactoe grid using min-max algorithm. This fails when the size of grid is more than 3.

      • minimax

        public static long minimax(java.lang.String[][] board,
                           int depth,
                           boolean isMax,
                           long alpha,
                           long beta)
        Parameters:
        board - This is a 2d grid representing the present state of the board
        depth - This is the depth of recursion happening while computing the solutions
        isMax - This represents weather this method is invoked for max or min state
        alpha - The value corresponding to alpha
        beta - The value corresponding to beta
        Returns:
        This method returns the score corresponding to the permuted state or partial score when the depth of recursion tree exceeds a threshold
        This function computes score corresponding to the state of the given tictactoe grid using min-max algorithm with alpha beta pruning. This scales till the size of grid is less than 5 for a pruned depth 5.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments
        Can be invoked through 2 ways.
        1. java TicTacToeDriver n
        2. java TicTacToeDriver ai n
        where n is an integer representing the size of the grid
